corePrinciples.name: Human Primacy
corePrinciples.description: All consequential decisions require human authorization and remain traceable to human intent

corePrinciples.name: Security-First
corePrinciples.description: Security and compliance requirements override convenience and performance

corePrinciples.name: Stress-Resilient Design
corePrinciples.description: Interfaces must remain functional and clear under high cognitive load

corePrinciples.name: Transparency by Design
corePrinciples.description: All system decisions and data provenance must be fully explainable

corePrinciples.name: Accessibility Always
corePrinciples.description: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance required for all features

interactionPatterns.name: Critical Action Pattern
implementationGuidelines: Multi-step confirmation process (at least 2 steps with 1-second delay)

interactionPatterns.name: Progressive Disclosure
interactionPatterns.description: Advanced features hidden behind role-based access
implementationGuidelines: Revealed based on user expertise and authorization level
Accompanied by contextual help and guidance

interactionPatterns.name: Context-Aware UI
interactionPatterns.description: Interface adapts based on user context
implementationGuidelines: Adapts based on user's security clearance and role
Changes based on operational context (normal vs emergency)
Responds to system stress levels and performance metrics

interactionPatterns.name: Consistent Visual Language
interactionPatterns.description: Single design system across all components
implementationGuidelines: Use the same design system (standardize on Radix/Tailwind)
Follow consistent color, typography, and spacing patterns
Maintain accessibility compliance across all states
